config-rpm.description: Configures a deploy build system to automate deployment and maintenance of Rackspace-hosted cloud systems. See http://www.rackspace.com/knowledge_center/article/installing-python-novaclient-on-linux-and-mac-os for additional information.
config-rpm.script: # install rackspace-novaclient for pkg in distribute setuptools rackspace-novaclient; do info=`python-pip install --upgrade $pkg` || \ { echo $info >&2; exit 1; } done
